column6: The toughest, funniest, craziest and most adorable Marvel heroes THROW DOWN. Featuring all your favorites including Cyclops, Hawkeye, Black Widow, Wolverine! They're all there, just shorter! Skottie Young brings out the big guns in the series fans have been waiting for!
column8: | editor:Sana Amanat | editor:Nick Lowe | inker:Skottie Young
